Answer:

String ant = "It was a dark and stormy night." 
    Correct.
String bat = new( "A shot rang out in the dark." ); 
    Wrong--new needs a constructor name.
int    cat = "123"; 
    Wrong--can't initialize an int to a String
double dog = 45.69; 
    Correct
